title: Damn It.
body:
I was joining a game, had the 'Your internet has disconnected, please try again',(When I was on youtube and facebook so my internet was fine) Try log back in, now I gotta update the client, Hopefully no low priority queue.

Edit: Low priority queue, yay me.

replies.body: i had the exact same bloody thing
It's so annoying, because it's not like you coulda foreseen it crashing, and it was just bad timing that the patch came out when it did xD.
there for ages trying to connect, and i know the internet was fine because i was browsing this site at the exact same time
Yea, I was like rito pls.
Will do, 20 Min low priority lol. So annoyed right now.
send one for me while your there
